title: 83/473/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 July 1983 laying down the methods of cooperation between the European Economic Community and the International Commission on Civil Status
header:
21.9.1983 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 260/19
COMMISSION DECISION
of 12 July 1983
laying down the methods of cooperation between the Eurpean Economic Community and the International Commission on Civil Status
(83/473/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Agreement on methods of cooperation resulting from the exchange of letters between the European Economic Community and the International Commission on Civil Status is hereby approved.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 July 1983.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
